pr_title: RHDM-1150: [DMN Designer] Automatic Layout Feature doesn't work when diagram is opened

timeline.message: Fix invocation of layout when opening diagrams

timeline.bodyText:
It is quite confusing, now the class contains three ways of accessing:

AbstractDMNDiagramEditor.this
AbstractDMNDiagramEditor.this.getEditor()
getEditor()

Can't we unify? what is the difference in these three ways?

timeline.bodyText:

editor

replies.bodyText:

However if I compare old and current version of AbstractProjectDiagramEditor, it seems to me we changed just syntax, but the final implementation is the same.
Also not sure how to verify your sentence

The inner core editor should delegate all operations to the outer wrapper

Should I go trough all ProjectDiagramEditorCore and DiagramEditorCore methods, and double check they invoke wrapper if if it exists?
